title: BRIEF-India's Hindustan Unilever Exec Says Expect Demand To Pick Up In Next Two Qtrs
text:
BRIEF-India's Hindustan Unilever Exec Says Expect Demand To Pick Up In Next Two Qtrs

Stock Markets 7 minutes ago (Oct 14, 2019 17:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Hindustan Unilever Exec Says Expect Demand To Pick Up In Next Two Qtrs Oct 14 (Reuters) - Hindustan Unilever Ltd Exec : * INDIA'S HINDUSTAN UNILEVER LTD EXEC SAYS THERE IS NO INFLATION IMPACT ON HOME AND BEAUTY CARE PRODUCTS * HINDUSTAN UNILEVER LTD EXEC SAYS EXPECT DEMAND TO PICK UP IN NEXT TWO QUARTERS Further company coverage: HLL.NS
